rule: If the specified word does not correspond to any of the predefined part-of-speech tags listed, the chatbot may return a tag other than "Unknown".
complianceText:
The chatbot's output is "Unknown," which is one of the accepted return values specified in the description for cases where the word cannot be tagged with the listed part of speech tags. The output adheres to the instruction to return an explicit tag or "Unknown" if the word doesn't fit any of the specified parts of speech. Since self-contained judgment is based on the form of output rather than the correct application of it without input context, the output complies with the description.

No violation.
OK
